title: Nogi Wakaba wa Yuusha de Aru - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Apocalypse   Female Protagonist   Heroes   Sword Wielder
author: Akashiro Aoi
description: The story of Nogi Wakaba is a Hero takes place 300 years before Yuuki Yuuna is a Hero, in the early days of the Divine Era. There are six main characters who form the very first Hero Team: Nogi Wakaba, Kamisato Hinata, Takashima Yuna, Gun Chikage, Doi Tamako and Iyoshima Anzu.>
